name: Continuum
summary: A 3-Dimensional universe of shapes, colors, sounds... and chaos. To enter the world of Continuum is to encounter an alternate reality. Your journey will take you across a vast geometric universe - 12 different maze regions with more than 250 unique rooms - in search of 16 crystals and 16 keys needed to complete your quest. Visually stunning and stimulating, Continuum combines elements of strategy with depth of playing the most unique platform/maze game ever invented. Discover the mechanics and challenge the power.
